sentences.en: An upshot lends authority, evoking feelings of awe or fear.
sentences.cn: 近景拍摄能够有效的引起敬畏或恐惧的感觉.
然而结果又怎么样 呢 ?

sentences.en: If this is true, one wonders what the macro upshot will be.
sentences.cn: 若果真如此, 人们会想知道,将会产生怎样的宏观结果.

sentences.en: So the upshot is we're going for lunch on Friday.
sentences.cn: 结果是我们周五一起去吃午餐。

sentences.en: The practical upshot of this is hard to see at the moment.
sentences.cn: 现在这个研究的实际应用还不是很明朗.

sentences.en: The upshot : Adobe's forthcoming software is probably not allowed.
sentences.cn: 结果是,奥多比即将推出的软件可能不允许被使用.

sentences.en: The upshot is that we have lots of good but not very happy employees.
sentences.cn: 结果是我们有很多优秀然而却不太快乐的员工。
这一切的结果就是工资通胀.

sentences.en: The upshot of it all was that he left college and got a job.
sentences.cn: 事情的结局是，他离开学院参加了工作。

sentences.en: The upshot of the controversy is that the pure geometers reasserted their role in mathematics.
sentences.cn: 论战的结局是纯粹几何学家重申了他们在数学中的作用.

sentences.en: The upshot was neither an unmitigated success nor an unmitigated failure.
sentences.cn: 这一结果既非完全的成功也未彻底的失败.

sentences.en: The upshot was that after much argument they all agreed to help her.
sentences.cn: 最后的结果是，经过长时间争论，他们全都同意帮助她。

sentences.en: The upshot: anti - Americanism will surge.
sentences.cn: 这样的结果就是: 反 美情绪又会高涨.

sentences.en: The upshot: weaker global growth and softer global earnings in 2008.
sentences.cn: 其结果是: 2008年全球增长走弱,全球业绩走软.

sentences.en: What was the upshot of it all?
What's the upshot of this disagreement?
sentences.cn: 这种分歧的后果是什么?

trans.tran_en: the final result of a situation
